name: The Promblem - GGJ 2023
description:
THIS GAME CONTAINS DEPICTIONS OF RACISM, PREJUDICE, MANY -PHOBIAS AND MORE! For Global Game Jam 2023, made by Madison Smith and Ceecee Huff in six days.

The prettiest cat girl in the whole school.. She's aiming for Prom Queen. You're aiming for a dance with her. And you have five days to get yourself together.

With the support of your friends, experience the world of cats and rabbits through the eyes of a mixed kid looking for their place in the world. Relive the horrors and joy that is high school. Find out who is safe and who is not.

Shortly explore a post-war world filled with cats, rabbits, and all inbetween, and the life of someone who's accepted by no single community. Express yourself through choices that show response and change appearance.

Pick your 'fit, impress your friends, and maybe even win a date with Priscilla.. if you can manage not to mess everything up!
